vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Lotto.cash (patch_12.sol#90-110) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(subpot) (patch_12.sol#107)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
Lotto.blockReward should be constant (patch_12.sol#8)
Lotto.blocksPerRound should be constant (patch_12.sol#4)
Lotto.ticketPrice should be constant (patch_12.sol#6)

vulnerability_findings.name: deprecated-standards
vulnerability_findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected @ patch_12.sol#49:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
